suncertify.network.rmi
Class RMIRegistrator

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.network.rmi.RMIRegistrator

public class RMIRegistrator
extends java.lang.Object

The server registrator that manages to bind and unbind the database server in RMI registry.

Field Summary

          The name on that the database server is registered in RMI registry.

Method Detail

register

public static void register(java.lang.String dbLocation,
                            int port)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Registering the records server in RMI registry.

Parameters:
dbLocation - The local database location.
port - The port to register.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if some IO-failure raises.

isRegistered

public static boolean isRegistered(int port)
Checks if the server is registered in the RMI registry.

Parameters:
port - The port to check in the registry.
Returns:
true if the server is registered on the given port.

unregister

public static void unregister(int port)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              java.rmi.NotBoundException
Unregisteres the database server at the given port.

Parameters:
port - The port, the server is registered.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection to RMI server fails.
java.rmi.NotBoundException - if the database server is not bound on the port.

public static DatabaseAccess getClient(java.lang.String hostname,
                                       int port)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Gives the database access to get data from.

Parameters:
hostname - The hostname of the RMI server.
port - The port of the server.
Returns:
The database access.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to RMI server fails.
